title: Fed’s Kaplan Ready to Talk About Paring Back Bond Buying
sub_head: The Dallas Fed president says the economy is rebounding faster than he expected
body:
Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Robert Kaplan said Thursday the U.S. economy is snapping back into action faster than he thought and that could be moving forward the day where the central bank can start paring back the amount of stimulus it is providing via bond buying.
